channel.title: Templates on Marek's Blog (ᵔ◡ᵔ)
channel.description: Recent content in Templates on Marek's Blog (ᵔ◡ᵔ)

item.title: Create Project Templates With Cookiecutter
item.description: Cookiecutter is a cross-platform application that can be used to create projects from templates and save you some time when you start a new project. Read this to learn how to use it with existing templates and how to create your own one.
